alert.note: Alert for Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Brantley; Coffee; Jeff Davis; Northern Ware; Pierce; Wayne (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued January 17 at 9:39AM EST until January 17 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the first Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 26. For the second Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 expected. * WHERE...Coffee, Jeff Davis, Bacon, Appling, Wayne, Atkinson, Pierce, Brantley and Northern Ware Counties. * WHEN...For the first Hard Freeze Warning, until 11 AM EST this morning. For the second Hard Freeze Warning, from 9 PM this evening to 8 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Brantley; Coffee; Jeff Davis; Northern Ware; Pierce; Wayne
